author: tisi
title: Is THIS a Lego set? I can't beleive it!
review: I can't understand anyone who likes this rubbish. Come on, there are no Lego pieces in it! It's just a total waste of plastic! Lego is a good toy, but this is not! What is that anyway? And why does he look like so stupid and nasty? All in all, I think Galidor was the biggest bad break in Lego's history. Really. I hope that Lego won't produce any more of this garbage, and it stays a nightmare.
